p: According to the data from WHO till March 2010, this new Influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 was estimated to have a case-fatality rate (CFR) of 1.28%. The CFR in our study was much higher (15%) in comparison to other studies [ 30] which may be due to under reporting of cases of H1N1 especially those of mild illness. The CFR during the wave was high in the fall season.
